name: Heroes of Might & Magic IV: Complete
description: Uses the GOG windows version for installing and playing.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Heroes of Might and Magic 4 Complete/heroes4.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Heroes of Might and Magic 4 Complete/heroes4.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
